xdb
Interface recordset

public abstract interface recordset

Enables access to data within standardized XML documents without DOM. The type of the XML document has to comply to this pseudo DTD:

<!ELEMENT recordset (record*)>
<!ELEMENT record (tag*)>
<!ELEMENT tag (#PCDATA)>

To build a valid DTD, just replace tag with the valid property-tags which you records will use.
